Title: Provides for certain restrictions on single-use plastic cutlery
Summary: Provides for certain restrictions on single-use plastic cutlery in restaurants.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 32 §§27-3201 - 27-3205, En Con L; add §399-tt, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the general business law, in relation to prohibitions on single-use plastic cutlery in restaurants
